item.title: SQL Optimization: Tips & Tricks
item.description: SQL (Structured Query Language) is a very common language and an essential tool used in day-to-day work of developers, data engineers and data analysts, data scientistsâ€¦ who want to interact with relational databases. Therefore, using SQL optimally is a great skill and a must-know technique. It could benefit us both time and money. In this article, I would like to share with you who are interested in SQL in general and SQL optimization in particular some tips and tricks for SQL optimization.
